cheatsheet.title: Upload a report to JasperReprot Server

description.b: In this cheatsheet we will see how to upload a report into a local installation of JasperReport Server. To follow this cheatsheet a connection to the JasperRepost Server is required, and also the report to upload must be already opened in the editor.

item.title: Go into the repository explorer
item.description: With a report opened, go into the repository explorer view.

item.title: Start the upload action
item.description: On the top right border of the editor window there is a button with a blu arrow. Click it to start the upload.

item.title: Select the location
item.description: Expand the server where you want to upload the report and select the folder "Reports"
